00037 #ifndef LUSTRE_PATCHLESS_COMPAT_H
00038 #define LUSTRE_PATCHLESS_COMPAT_H
00039 
00040 #include <linux/fs.h>
00041 #include <linux/mm.h>
00042 #ifndef HAVE_TRUNCATE_COMPLETE_PAGE
00043 #include <linux/list.h>
00044 #include <linux/hash.h>
00045 
00046 #ifndef HAVE_DELETE_FROM_PAGE_CACHE /* 2.6.39 */
00047 #ifndef HAVE_REMOVE_FROM_PAGE_CACHE /* 2.6.35 - 2.6.38 */
00048 
00049 /* XXX copy & paste from 2.6.15 kernel */
00050 static inline void ll_remove_from_page_cache(struct page *page)
00051 {
00052         struct address_space *mapping = page->mapping;
00053 
00054         BUG_ON(!PageLocked(page));
00055 
00056         spin_lock_irq(&mapping->tree_lock);
00057         radix_tree_delete(&mapping->page_tree, page->index);
00058         page->mapping = NULL;
00059         mapping->nrpages--;
00060         __dec_zone_page_state(page, NR_FILE_PAGES);
00061 
00062         spin_unlock_irq(&mapping->tree_lock);
00063 }
00064 #else /* HAVE_REMOVE_FROM_PAGE_CACHE */
00065 #define ll_remove_from_page_cache(page) remove_from_page_cache(page)
00066 #endif /* !HAVE_REMOVE_FROM_PAGE_CACHE */
00067 
00068 static inline void ll_delete_from_page_cache(struct page *page)
00069 {
00070         ll_remove_from_page_cache(page);
00071         page_cache_release(page);
00072 }
00073 #else /* HAVE_DELETE_FROM_PAGE_CACHE */
00074 #define ll_delete_from_page_cache(page) delete_from_page_cache(page)
00075 #endif /* !HAVE_DELETE_FROM_PAGE_CACHE */
00076 
00077 static inline void
00078 ll_cancel_dirty_page(struct address_space *mapping, struct page *page)
00079 {
00080 #ifdef HAVE_NEW_CANCEL_DIRTY_PAGE
00081         cancel_dirty_page(page);
00082 #elif defined(HAVE_CANCEL_DIRTY_PAGE)
00083         cancel_dirty_page(page, PAGE_SIZE);
00084 #else
00085         if (TestClearPageDirty(page))
00086                 account_page_cleaned(page, mapping);
00087 #endif  /* HAVE_NEW_CANCEL_DIRTY_PAGE */
00088 }
00089 
00090 static inline void
00091 truncate_complete_page(struct address_space *mapping, struct page *page)
00092 {
00093         if (page->mapping != mapping)
00094                 return;
00095 
00096         if (PagePrivate(page))
00097 #ifdef HAVE_INVALIDATE_RANGE
00098                 page->mapping->a_ops->invalidatepage(page, 0, PAGE_CACHE_SIZE);
00099 #else
00100                 page->mapping->a_ops->invalidatepage(page, 0);
00101 #endif
00102 
00103         ll_cancel_dirty_page(mapping, page);
00104         ClearPageMappedToDisk(page);
00105         ll_delete_from_page_cache(page);
00106 }
00107 #endif /* !HAVE_TRUNCATE_COMPLETE_PAGE */
00108 
00109 #ifdef HAVE_DCACHE_LOCK
00110 #  define dget_dlock(d)                 dget_locked(d)
00111 #  define ll_d_count(d)                 atomic_read(&(d)->d_count)
00112 #elif defined(HAVE_D_COUNT)
00113 #  define ll_d_count(d)                 d_count(d)
00114 #else
00115 #  define ll_d_count(d)                 ((d)->d_count)
00116 #endif /* HAVE_DCACHE_LOCK */
00117 
00118 #ifdef ATTR_OPEN
00119 # define ATTR_FROM_OPEN ATTR_OPEN
00120 #else
00121 # ifndef ATTR_FROM_OPEN
00122 #  define ATTR_FROM_OPEN 0
00123 # endif
00124 #endif /* ATTR_OPEN */
00125 
00126 #ifndef ATTR_RAW
00127 #define ATTR_RAW 0
00128 #endif
00129 
00130 #ifndef ATTR_CTIME_SET
00131 /*
00132  * set ATTR_CTIME_SET to a high value to avoid any risk of collision with other
00133  * ATTR_* attributes (see bug 13828)
00134  */
00135 #define ATTR_CTIME_SET (1 << 28)
00136 #endif
00137 
00138 #endif /* LUSTRE_PATCHLESS_COMPAT_H */
